Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
class to deal with the flight object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, int price)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPassenger(Customer passenger)
    method to add a passenger to the list of passenger objects
    void
    addPassengerID(int id)
    method to add a passenger ID to the list of passenger IDs
    double
    calculateCurrentPrice(LocalDate systemDate)
    method to calculate the current price if the departure date is within the next 7 days, the price is 1.5x the original price if the departure date is in 30 days or less, the price is 1.2x the original price if the flight is 80% full, the price is 1.3x the original price if the flight is 50% full, the price is 1.15x the original price

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, int price)
      initialisign the flight object
      Parameters:
      id - the ID value of the flight
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - the flight origin
      destination - the flight destination
      departureDate - the flight departure date
      capacity - the flight capacity
      price - the flight price

    • calculateCurrentPrice

      public double calculateCurrentPrice(LocalDate systemDate)
      method to calculate the current price if the departure date is within the next 7 days, the price is 1.5x the original price if the departure date is in 30 days or less, the price is 1.2x the original price if the flight is 80% full, the price is 1.3x the original price if the flight is 50% full, the price is 1.15x the original price
      Parameters:
      systemDate - the current date in the system
      Returns:
      returns the price of the flight
